actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported without amendment unfavorably.
Committee on Finance. Reported to Senate by Senator Bentsen unfavorably without amendment. With written report No. 102-102.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 150.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A joint resolution disapproving the recommendation of the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation treatment) to the products of the People's Republic of China.

summary.text: Disapproves the recommendation of the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation treatment) to the products of China.

titles.title: A joint resolution disapproving the recommendation of the President to extend nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation treatment) to the products of the People's Republic of China.
